description: Ministry of Defence - Order to establish firing ranges in Kahagolla, Haputhale D/S Division, Badulla District be known as 100 meters Small Arms Firing at Diyathalawa Air Force Training School and in Morawewa, Morawewa D/S Division, Trincomalee District be known as 300 meters Small Arms Firing Range at Morawewa Air Force Camp and the Firing Range Regulations - 1983
